A-MECHANICS
Considering Bangladesh automobile market and vehicle business, from import, sale, service and maintenance both the trader and uses are in dilemma. we system and developed the application software A-MECHANICS. This can be very useful for automobile traders as well as for workshop owners. Track record of every vehicle will be just a few clicks in the system.

Features:
Automobile workshop requirement based service software
Easy management of vehicles maintenance and services
Sales, spares, services, inventory account, HRM – all are in a single software

OTA-E Accounts & MIS

Business accounts control and monitoring is vital for any organization. OTAE has introduced a fully dynamic business accounts management and control solution for industries, and project managers. enterprise edition of AFC is a smart ERP solution with the option of optimization based on customer needs.

Features:

Accounting
HRM
Project Management
Asset Management
Inventory Control
Cloud based integration and operation

SCADA Solution

OTAE works for design, supply and integration of SCADA system for industries and utilities. We are official partner of world renowned ETAP-USA in Bangladesh. For electrical and energy SCADA solution we have partnership with IDS Germany and for water SCADA with DataWatt Netherlands.

Features:

Seamless integration 
Robust client / server architecture
Multi-redundant system
Scalable modular design
ODBC / SQL compliant database
Enterprise-side access
Multi-tiered user access management
ISO 9001 A3147 certified
Hardware independent
